sonarqube.showIssuesOnCodeViews.description: Whether to show Sonarqube issues inline on code views.

sonarqube.instanceUrl.description: The URL to the Sonarqube instance.

sonarqube.apiToken.description: The API authentication token for the Sonarqube instance, if needed.

sonarqube.corsAnywhereUrl.description: The URL to a CORS proxy.

sonarqube.repositoryNamePattern.description: Regular expression with that is matched on the repository name to extract the capture groups for organization and project key templates.

sonarqube.organizationKeyTemplate.description: Replace string to build the organization key from the repository name pattern, using $n references for capture groups. By default just uses the first capture group

sonarqube.projectKeyTemplate.description: Replace string to build the project key from the repository name pattern, using $n references for capture groups.

scripts.serve: yarn run symlink-package && parcel serve --no-hmr --out-file dist/sonarqube.js src/sonarqube.ts
scripts.sourcegraph:prepublish: yarn run typecheck && yarn run build
